ygData.subject: RE: Crude Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: Crude Stien is the stien that adds +15 CHA, right? Well, that one is off the bouncers in Feerrott. No quest to get it, just need a big bad ass character to
ygData.messageBody:
Crude Stien is the stien that adds +15 CHA, right? Well, that one is off the
bouncers in Feerrott. No quest to get it, just need a big bad ass character
to take em out (they are lore, so I just went to Feerrott and looted one off
a corpse that a ncie Druid was willing to save for me ;-). That druid was
47th level, by the way. And the bouncers still resisted snare alot...

-----Original Message-----
From: Reuben Aguilar [mailto:reuben@...]
Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 1:03 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Crude Stein


From: "Reuben Aguilar" <reuben@...>

Ok Next question.. (thanks for the help btw)

The Crude Stein has a decent bonus ratio also.. So I was wondering how does
one get this ? is this like the glowing stein that it takes a certain race
or so to do it ? .. I will finish the glowing stein tonight, but I want to
complete the Crude Stein soon also.. Is it possible to equip a stein in both
hands ? Like the crude stein in one and the glowing stein in the other ? ..
thats my goal.. but non the less.. id like em both still..

Thanks

Nate Spiritsummoner
Rodcet Nife Server
